H0.text: What is the name for the practice of water divining by deploying a deflecting stick. Radiesthesia

H1.text: What is the name for the practice of water divining by deploying a deflecting stick. Geomancy

H2.text: What is the name for the practice of water divining by deploying a deflecting stick. Hydromancy

H3.text: What is the name for the practice of water divining by deploying a deflecting stick. Dowsing/Rhabdomancy

A4.text: Rhabdomancy is a divination technique which involves the use of any rod, wand, staff, stick, arrow, or the like.

A5.text: Another type of rhabdomancy is dowsing in its traditional form of using a wooden stick, usually forked.
